thread.title: Impressive Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave beat Samuel Inkoom's Boavista
thread.title_full: Impressive Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave beat Samuel Inkoom's Boavista

title: Impressive Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave beat Samuel Inkoom's Boavista
text:
21:55 CET Impressive Alhassan Wakaso helps Rio Ave beat Samuel Inkoom's Boavista - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghanaian midfielder Alhassan Wakaso continued his impressive start to the Portuguese league season to help Rio Ave post a 1-0 victory over Boavista. 
The 23-year-old produced another world class display in the middle of the pitch to help his side to victory. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
